data.message:
Donald J. Trump helps people, takes no salary & gives money..

You made millions ??? In the United States?? You are no different as far as money. You just think you are.
#alwayspissed

You want the praise of other entertainers .

replies.message: God you are fucking stupid. He is taking a salary. It has already been fucking proven. He is also over budget with his secret service so that is taking money away from the fucking public. He hasn't just given any of his money to anyone or any organization. Do some damn research before you speak

He gave money away well before becoming President. He has always been a philanthropist as much as Oprah & others but unlike them he did not bring attention to it.
Many of these people came forward since he has been persecuted like he has by Eminem, who has some of the most violent lyrics out there.
Eminem has openly admitted to such rage as wanting to kill his mother.
Eminem has also made millions from Americans that is a good salary getting paid to air all of your thoughts & opinions.
I feel very much compassion for those in entertainment today who are all boarding the great Titanic of hate & Illuminati....
We must never forget no matter how greatly intelligent we are..
We are not above Jesus Christ.
Christ enabled us to have all we have. 
Like Eminem, who God or satan gave great influence & he has thus far used it for immediate gratification of beats & chill bumps & rage.
It is temporary.

Anything done in Christ lasts forever. 
It is eternal.
God bless you...we have a right given by Christ to either believe or not to believe.

takes no money? who do you think all those taxpayer $ go to when we pay for him, the security, and his guest to stay at one of his resorts goes? right back into his pocket, its his resort, and like any business a person owns, when it makes $ a portion of that goes into the owners pockets, so sure he is not taking his pay check hes getting more just for trips to his resorts, and yes he has it set up where even he has to stay there, and play golf there, and eat there, oh and has to pay for the golf cart. and who has he supposedly given that $ to I have not seen any thing about him giving his pay check to any one.

I'm not going to argue.
Donald J. Trump does not need money.

Now, the Clinton's needed money, as proven . 
Scandal after scandal.
And you good people crucify a billionaire who truly loves America.
And if ANYONE deserves a Presidential salary it is this President.
You know, I very much disliked Obama but I respected the Office and I believe he loves his wife & children. There is something good in even the worst of us usually, but what makes this SO ""Jesus & Barnabas"" (Clinton's being Barnabas) is you good people REFUSE to credit this man anything.

But money is not even my main issue.

Eminem who will answer for his platform of influence...spews rage & violence to the youth of this world?? And made millions doing it.

Please address Eminem REPEATEDLY spewing hate, violence & rage....even until current day, still immature perception...
We will never come together the way Eminem is doing it...
Martin Luther King is still respected today because he was NOT DIVISIVE.
Jesus Christ is the only reason I'm not .
Jesus Christ is all that matters.
He is King.
Not money, fame or knowledge. We will never be ABOVE our Creator. 

But Donald J. Trump needing money is a complete non issue for me personally bc I believe he is a giver. 
People hated Abraham Lincoln vehemently, he upset entertainers & media as well...

And for Eminem to talk like a "country white" person when he came out of a trailer park AND welfare....and secondly, middle aged Americans are who made him a millionaire...
I mean who in this comparison is the selfish person? 
I say none of this with hatred in my heart, hate is not going to help but put an end to America.

India Cross 
Leave the meth alone
Respond to the actual questions & I will listen😊

There are consequences to EVERYTHING. Even down to what we eat. How fast we go in a car. 
So how much more our lives? 
Our actual lives we lived.
We will all give an account.
What is your plumb line??
Prince? Michael Jackson? Whitney? Eminem?

We are all flawed...we all a mess.
This is why Jesus and the Word of God is supposed to be our plumb line.
And because it is not we have the mess we have. World wide.
India you can’t argue with brainwashed idiots.

We all need to PRAY.....for each other...all of us.... I love my fellow man.
#humans

Donald J. Trump does not need money.
This is not even an issue?
Presidential salary is chump change for him anyway.

He thought being a billionaire President of a Nation in trillions of debt could keep it..
Donald tRump makes more money for his family whenever he stays at a tRump Hotel and whenever NOT at the White House he stays at one of them. He rents out 2 floors...give me a break!
